channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: A battery plant fire in California started during a boom for energy storage
item.description: A fire at a one of the world’s largest battery plants in California contained tens of thousands of lithium batteries that store power from renewable energy sources.

item.title: TikTok says it will ‘go dark’ unless it gets clarity from Biden following Supreme Court ruling
The rise - and potential fall - of TikTok in the US
